DISABLE BUTTON IS NOT SELECTED - TEAM STATUS is Enabled

kw.name: Get User Team Db
kw.doc: TODO: Create a database query to retrieve the User Team Details.
kw.msg: Executing query. SELECT ut.name as Team_Name, ut.description as Team_Description, u.name as Team_Lead, ul.code as Team_Location, ut.type as Team_Type, ut.status as Team_Status, ut.updateTime as Last_Updated FROM kjt.userteam AS ut JOIN kjt.user AS u ON ut.teamLead = u.uid JOIN kjt.userlocation AS ul ON ut.location = ul.lid WHERE ut.name = %s;
